overview: Andy Lee is passionate about finding and designing new solutions for complex problems through research and collaboration with clients, customers and experts. Andy’s special interest lies in finding and creating new product opportunities through cross-industry and cross-disciplinary research. Prior to Vital Findings, Andy spent five years at Nissan North America’s Advanced Strategy and Planning group, planning market strategies and helping integrate consumer needs into future vehicle designs ranging from commercial, luxury to electric vehicles. His experience extends into mechanical design and systems engineering. For example he worked on sophisticated optical and sensor systems for use in outer space at Raytheon. Andy holds a Masterâ€™s of Product Development (MPD) from Carnegie Mellon University and a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from University of California, Berkeley.

relationships.title: Senior Manager of Research and Design
